page.title: 20HOUSING AROUND WEDMORE
page.content:
The age of houses in the Wedmore_ Blackford area varies from 5 to 500 years. About 40% of these houses are over 80 years old. Most are made of Wedmore stone but the modern houses are built of breeze block and bricks. 90% of the houses are detatched. These conditions contribute to the average houses price of Â£65 000! About 65% of houses have{mains drainage}and 60% have{gas.}Many people move into the area because the houses are considered to be attractive.
* * * * * * * * * * *
Compiled by the 3rd and 4th year pupils and members of staff of{Hugh {Sexey Middle School, Blackford,}with help from members of the local community, during June and July 1985.
